short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Productivity tools for Salesforce administrators and developers to inspect data and metadata directly from the Salesforce UI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is based on the original Salesforce inspector extension made by SÃ¸ren Krabbe and Salesforce inspector reloaded by Thomas Prouvot.

Salesforce Inspector Advanced contains lots of new features:

- Export: Improved SOQL suggestions : subquery, in, like, excludes, includes...SOSL and Graphql support, inline edit, download csv, date format
- Query editor: In place suggestions, syntax highlighting, ...
- SOQL, APEX Editor with in place suggestion, syntax highlighting, ....
- Add APEX script runner with history and logs/jobs polling
- Add Log support: profiler, flame chart, search and download
- Monitor and register Platform Event and legacy events
- Explore api : template, history and saved request
- Flow : where it is used, clear old version
- Shortcut tab to open directly item from setup

And many more !
https://github.com/dufoli/Salesforce-Inspector-Advanced
